scripts.dev: concurrently -n "frontend,backend" -c "cyan,green" "npm run dev -w packages/frontend" "npm run dev -w packages/backend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/frontend && npm run build -w packages/backend
scripts.start: concurrently -n "frontend,backend" -c "cyan,green" "npm run start -w packages/frontend" "npm run start -w packages/backend"
scripts.test: npm run test -w packages/frontend && npm run test -w packages/backend
